Uses of Class
dirsync.directory.Directory

Packages that use Directory
dirsync.directory Provides the classes necessary to model a Directory. 
dirsync.sync Provides the classes necessary to model the Synchronization. 
 

Uses of Directory in dirsync.directory
 

Methods in dirsync.directory with parameters of type Directory
 void Directory.copyOptions(Directory dir)
          Copies the options from the given directory to this directory.
 

Uses of Directory in dirsync.sync
 

Methods in dirsync.sync with parameters of type Directory
 void Sync.copyOptionsToAllDirs(Directory dirWithOptions)
          Copy the options of the given directory definitions to ALL directory definitions (including itself).
 void Sync.copyOptionsToEnabledDirs(Directory dirWithOptions)
          Copy the options of the given directory definitions to all ENABLED directory definitions (including itself).
